body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Jacob Williams. May I have your name, please?

Hi Jacob! My name is Cheryl Long.

Nice to meet you, Cheryl! How can I assist you today?

I'm interested in learning about the pricing for your piano lessons.

Certainly, Cheryl! Could I have your email address to send you our detailed pricing brochure?

Sure, my email is cheryl.long@example.com.

Thank you, Cheryl. Also, could I have your contact number just in case we need to follow up with more details?

Of course! My contact number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Great, thank you! Our piano lessons start at sixty dollars per hour, and we offer discounts for packages of five or ten lessons.

That sounds wonderful! Thank you so much for the information.

You're welcome, Cheryl! Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. Have a fantastic day!
